Interface PhotoDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
PhotoDAOPostgres
public interface PhotoDAO
Interface for photo-related data access operations. Provides methods for CRUD operations and fetching photo data.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    deletePhoto(int photoId)
    Deletes a photo from the database by its ID.
    List<Photo>
    getAllPhotos()
    Retrieves all photos from the database.
    List<Photo>
    getAllPhotosByUserId(int userId)
    Retrieves all photos from the database by user ID.
    Photo
    getPhotoById(int photoId)
    Retrieves a photo by its ID.
    void
    publishPhoto(Photo photo)
    Publishes a new photo by inserting it into the database.
    void
    updatePhoto(Photo photo)
    Updates the details of an existing photo in the database.

  • Method Details

    • publishPhoto

      void publishPhoto(Photo photo)
      Publishes a new photo by inserting it into the database.
      Parameters:
      photo - The photo to be published.

    • updatePhoto

      void updatePhoto(Photo photo)
      Updates the details of an existing photo in the database.
      Parameters:
      photo - The photo with updated information.

    • deletePhoto

      void deletePhoto(int photoId)
      Deletes a photo from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      photoId - The ID of the photo to be deleted.

    • getPhotoById

      Photo getPhotoById(int photoId)
      Retrieves a photo by its ID.
      Parameters:
      photoId - The ID of the photo to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The photo object corresponding to the ID, or null if not found.

    • getAllPhotos

      List<Photo> getAllPhotos()
      Retrieves all photos from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all photos in the database.

    • getAllPhotosByUserId

      List<Photo> getAllPhotosByUserId(int userId)
      Retrieves all photos from the database by user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose photos are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of all photos in the database by the user.
